title: Enter the Information is Beautiful Awards 2022 – it’s back
dc:creator: David McCandless
description: Our yearly celebration of the best infographics and data-visualisations from around the world is back! content:encoded:
Our yearly celebration of the best infographics and data-visualisations from around the world is back! Now in partnership with The Data Visualisation Society, a professional home and community for those working in this discipline.

If you create in this field, you may wish to submit your work.

We welcome entries of any type: infographics, data journalism, maps, interactives, information art, video, animation, app, site, sculpture, or artwork. Entries can be created in any software, platform, or medium, using any type of materials.

There are ten categories open for submission:

» Arts, Entertainment & Culture
» Business Analytics
» Current Affairs & Politics
» Humanitarian
» Leisure, Games & Sport
» People, Language & Identity
» Places, Spaces & Environment
» Science, Technology & HealthÂ 
» 2022 Special Category: COVID-19
» Unusual

Entries are currently open and will close on Sep 18th 2022.
Any work created between Sep 1st 2019 and Aug 2022 is eligible.
» See more criteria for entry

You can see previous years’ winners and entries on the Information is Beautiful Awards Showcase.

See you at the Awards ceremony on Nov 30th?
